page.title: 17CHANGES IN CHARLTON (1)
page.content: We had a shop in Charlton by the Bus Garage but it closed down two years ago. Across the road from the Bus Garage there was a Post Office and a shop but it has been made into a house now and it's called The Old Post Office. The person who owned it was called Mr Coates. Many of the houses in Charlton are fairly new because they have been improved.The only old one by our School is Mr Butler's but there are some more old houses elsewhere around the village. Twelve years ago some houses cost eight thousand pounds but now they can cost sixty nine thousand pounds. We did have two pubs.They were called THE GEORGE AND DRAGON and THE CROWN.Now we have only got one pub because THE GEORGE AND DRAGON has closed down.
